message: I'm offering you a fair $4000 now. Remember, if you reject, your money will be worth 20% less next round.
Let's split it evenly. We both get a fair share, and we don't have to worry about the money losing value.
Due to the 40% depreciation you're facing, this $3000 is actually worth only $1800 to you now. If you reject, it will be worth even less next round. This is your best option at this point.
I understand the money is losing value, but I still believe a more even split is fair. Let's compromise and avoid any further depreciation.
